name: ChoreChooser
0:
”Alexa, open Chore Chooser”
”Alexa, ask Chore Chooser who should take out the trash”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chore chooser
des: Next time you are trying to decide who is to do what or who’s to choose what, just use Chore Chooser! Have Alexa choose for you. No arguing necessary! It is also completely random and fair.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
